articles.title: LATAM flight: Passenger describe wild ride after 'technical' event - The Associated Press
articles.description: Officials are investigating what caused a “strong shake” before a sudden plunge on a plane traveling between Australia and New Zealand. A passenger has described a wild ride with people hitting the plane’s ceiling. At least 50 people were injured Monday on th…
articles.content: SYDNEY (AP) As officials investigate what caused a strong shake before a sudden plunge on a plane traveling between Australia and New Zealand, a passenger on Tuesday described a wild ride, with peopl… [+2267 chars]
